pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface for 'Google Gemini' API // Provides a comprehensive interface for Google Gemini API, enabling users to access and utilize Gemini Large Language Model (LLM) functionalities directly from R. This package facilitates seamless integration with Google Gemini, allowing for advanced language processing, text generation, and other AI-driven capabilities within the R environment. For more information, please visit https://ai.google.dev/docs/gemini_api_overview.
